topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fbd52c6368722401ac0000#post_53fbd52c6368722401ac0000
I personally think that people put booze on too much of a pedestal. They make it out to be this big scary or impressive or manly or mature thing when all it is is a drug that lowers your inhibitions and exaggerates whatever mood you're already in. This is why I don't drink when I'm feeling down or pissed off.
